```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(DT)
cime <- read.csv("cime.csv")
for(i in seq(nrow(cime))){
  cime$Enllac[i] <- paste(paste0(
    "<a href='", unlist(strsplit(cime$Enllac[i], "; ")),
    "' target='_blank'>", paste0("link-", seq(length(unlist(strsplit(cime$Enllac[i], "; "))))),"</a>"), 
    collapse = "\n")
}
cime$Localitat <- paste0("<a href='https://outdoorbreaks.blogspot.com/search/label/", cime$Localitat, "' target='_blank'>", cime$Localitat, "</a>")
cime$Localitat<- gsub("label/Courmayeur", "label/Aosta", cime$Localitat)
cime$Localitat <- gsub("label/Ledro", "label/Garda", cime$Localitat)
cime$Regio <- paste0("<a href='https://outdoorbreaks.blogspot.com/search/label/", cime$Regio, "' target='_blank'>", cime$Regio, "</a>")
cime <- cime[order(cime$Regio, cime$Provincia, cime$Localitat, cime$Cim, cime$Altitud),]
datatable(cime[,-5], filter = list(position = "top"), 
          options = list(pageLength = nrow(cime), dom = 't'), rownames= FALSE,
          colnames = c("Cim", "Altitud (m.)", "Localitat", "Provincia", "EnllaÃ§"), escape = FALSE)
```
